name: BALANCE BLOCK BATTLE
description:
Kick blocks at your opponent. 

Don't let the blocks stack on your platform or it will fall.

Designed for 2 players, or train against AI.

Made for Ludum Dare 49.

 Credits:

Programming, Sound by Lane Howard (squigglez)

Art, Sound, and Music by Eli Armero (peepo)

CONTROLS: Keyboard / [Xbox controller]

Arrow keys / [left stick or d-pad]: move

Up / [A]: Jump

Z / [X]: Light kick, Menu select

X / [Y]: Medium kick

C / [B]: Heavy kick

V / [RT]: Knee
